none: media/user/SCRAPE/test/2015-01-after-slow-metallica-esque-intro/extracted/divided we fall/03 Divided We Fall Anthem
Divided We Fall - Divided We Fall 1993 demo
Divided We Fall - Divided We Fall 1993 demo

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on January 25, 2015 Description from Terminal Escape:
After slow, METALLICA-esque intro, DIVIDED WE FALL turn into an unimaginably burly hardcore steamroller. Early Blood, Sweat era SOIA with more than enough chug to satisfy any early '90s 'core mutant. The recording is blown to shit, giving these kids a disconcerting edge that definitely works in their favor...I just wish there were more than three songs. "Dissed and Backbitten" is your "time to break shit" jam of the weekend. DIVIDED WE FALL
//1.bp.blogspot.com/-rSkdbpGXDrE/VMT5BrWSrnI/AAAAAAAALgU/taijLdfJ_CQ/s1600/divided%2Bwe%2Bfall%2Bcover.jpg //1.bp.blogspot.com/-GBNsfT_ZR-E/VMT6wpUr6BI/AAAAAAAALgg/HwvI2a0ya8g/s1600/divided%2Bwe%2Bfall%2Bimg.jpg
